name: Perfect Angle (itch)
description:
An arcade-puzzle style game, where you must orient the center object to match the incoming object's angle in time, before it reaches the center. 3 stages (easy, normal, hard), appropriate for all ages.

The game works on windows (osx at a later date) and linux. Includes 32bit and 64bit versions of the game. Game uses a mouse or touch controls.

Note, if your graphics card is blacklisted in chrome/firefox browsers, the game will fall back to software rendering, which is slower then using WebGL. Make sure your video card is not shown in the link before paying. https://www.khronos.org/webgl/wiki/BlacklistsAndWh...
